notesStmt.note: Hebrew lead word denoted by colons placed before and after, plus two dots above the word (EC: NS25 -missing?- was recognized as being from the same ms as NS 19, and was recorded as such. Please note this when you produce the images of these; SJ: "NS25" may be 85.313.39 - 02/06/2004). The first folio contains the translation of Exodus II 1-14 אלמצרי. The second starts in the translation of ibid. III 16 דכרכם to the end of IV 7. A Hebrew lead-word is provided at the beginning of each verse. Parallel to, in the edition published by Derenbourg: Version arabe du Pentateuque de r. Saadia ben Iosef al-Fayyoúmi / Joseph Derenbourg ed.. Paris : E. Leroux, 1893,pp. 82, 84-85 with a few minor variants.
